headline: 5 Insightful Analyst Questions From Moderna’s Q3 Earnings Call
summary: Moderna’s third quarter was shaped by sharply lower demand for COVID-19 vaccines, yet the company delivered results above Wall Street expectations for both revenue and earnings. Management attributed the outperformance to rigorous cost discipline, with CEO Stéphane Bancel noting a 34% reduction in combined cost of sales, R&D, and SG&A compared to last year. The company also cited strong market uptake of its new COVID vaccine, mNEXSPIKE, and the impact of ongoing productivity initiatives. CFO Jam
